Welcome To My Profile

Hard-working web developer with a flair for creating elegant solutions in the least amount of time. developed on ecommerce webapp, customer web portal, documentary launch website, and donations webapp for a local charity. Passionate about software architecture and cloud computing. Regular attendee of web developer meetups hackathons.
